item.title: NotebookLm is a Completly one stop solution for your learnings Revolution!
item.description: Discover NotebookLM: Free AI learning platform that turns your documents into podcasts, videos & mind maps. Chat with PDFs, create study guides & more!
item.dc:creator: Abdulbasit Memon
item.content:encoded:
NotebookLM is a completely one-stop solution for your learning where you can upload your learning materials, links, YouTube videos, and your bookmarks in the sources. But if you don't have any sources but you have a curiosity for learning and want to deep dive into any topic, you just go to the discover sources and write what you want to learn or research on any topic you just have curiosity about. You just type a prompt with your topic in discover sources, and it will search over the internet and bring completely relevant docs, articles, research papers, and educational materials for you that you can directly add into the sources - that's just incredible and amazing!

After you're done with enough and relevant sources, now you have full access to chat with your uploaded PDFs/sources and ask whatever you want and think about. Have anything where you're stuck? Just write your query, and the NotebookLM model can go through your entire sources, analyze and understand the sources and your query context, and give you optimized output within your sources. So that's incredible! Also, you can explore more features - you can prompt and make your learning journey more interactive and amazing and blow your mind completely with the features.

Let's move on to the additional and something amazing features of NotebookLM that will blow your mind completely and change your learning game forever and make you addicted to learning because it's so interactive and amazing.

Audio Overview - Your Personal Podcast Experience That Will Blow Your Mind

You can create completely amazing multi-speaker audio from your sources that give you a complete overview and information over the perspective of your topic and in-depth dive into that with multi speakers, just like a personalized podcast on your niche topic and interactive audiobook within/from your own sources and documents. You'll get a completely blown and amazing experience that you never experienced before - that kind of learning experience is just incredible and mind-blowing feature.

Study Guide and Reports - Complete Briefing That Changes Everything

Another very awesome feature is making the reports text-based - making the study guide doc and also complete briefing to your uploaded sources and giving you a full overview upon the topic. Hence, you can understand and move forward in your journey with the topic and brainstorm based on that and make your learning more structured and organized that helps you to understand better and deep dive into the topic with complete understanding and clarity.

Interactive Mind Map - Structure Your Brain Like Never Before

In NotebookLM, you can create an interactive mind map that's just blown down and make the mind map that is completely structured and goes deep dive and also gives you a complete outline. Based on that outline, you can deep dive into any topic that you want. Also, that gives you fully structured branches that you can expand when needed, and click on that topic or branch - it will automatically redirect you into chat with that topic, and study with research goes on interactively and structurally. You can make notes when needed and add them as saved notes to sources too. That's just incredible and amazing how interactive and structured your learning becomes with this feature.

Video Creation - The Most Advanced Mind Blowing Feature

The final and most advanced recently added part of NotebookLM is you can make complete videos from your notebook. It will analyze, read, and understand your content and all sources. Based on those sources, you can make complete mind-blown videos from the sources with voice-over and proper text visuals and proper presentation - super amazing and incredible feature that will change your learning experience completely and make you feel like you have your own personal teacher and content creator that creates amazing videos for you based on your sources and documents.

Why This is Game Changer for Every Student and Learner

Hence, what a student needs is here, all free and in the hands of students today, so no compromise - just make your learning to the next level and experience the learning like never before with all these incredible features that will change your learning game forever and make you addicted to learning because it's so interactive and amazing and structured that you will love to learn and deep dive into any topic you want with complete understanding and clarity.

This is not just a tool - this is a complete revolution in learning and education that will change how you learn and understand any topic with complete depth and clarity and make your learning journey more interactive and amazing than ever before. So just try it and experience the magic of NotebookLM and see how it transforms your learning experience completely and makes you fall in love with learning again!

Just visit and Explore by yourself here NotebookLM

]]>

item.title: Discover Islam's Treasures: Essential Websites for Quran, Sunnah, and More!
item.description: Dive into a world of Islamic wisdom! Explore essential websites to deepen your understanding of the Quran, Sunnah, and more. Elevate your spiritual journey.
item.dc:creator: Abdulbasit Memon
item.content:encoded:
In today's technologically advanced world, the internet has become an essential tool for seeking knowledge. When it comes to deepening your of Islam, there are numerous websites that can serve as valuable resources. These platforms offer a wealth of information, ranging from Quranic recitations to prayer timings and even AI-powered Quran learning. In this blog post, we will explore some of the top websites that can help you strengthen your Islamic knowledge.

1. Quran.com

Quran.com is a website that provides a comprehensive platform for reading, studying, and learning The Noble Quran. With its user-friendly interface, accessing different translations and interpretations of the Quran has never been easier. The website allows you to navigate through various chapters and verses, making it convenient to explore specific topics or dive into a verse-by-verse analysis. Quran.com also offers audio recitations, making it an excellent resource for those who prefer to listen to the Quran while following along.

2. Quranicaudio.com

For those seeking an extensive library of Quranic recitations and tilawats, Quranicaudio.com is the ideal website. Here, you can find a vast collection of recitations from renowned qaris around the world. Listening to these beautiful renditions can help deepen your connection with the divine words of the Quran. Whether you prefer the mellifluous recitation style of Abdul Rahman Al-Sudais or the soul-stirring recitation of Mishary Rashid Alafasy, Quranicaudio.com offers an incredible variety of recitations to choose from.

3. Salah.com

Sunnah.com is a treasure trove of information for every Muslim seeking to learn and understand the Hadith of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him). This website provides access to a vast collection of hadiths, making it an indispensable resource for understanding the teachings and practices of the Prophet. The user-friendly interface allows you to easily search for hadiths based on various criteria, such as book, chapter, or narrator. Sunnah.com enables you to explore the words and actions of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) at your fingertips.

4. Legacy.quran.com

When you want to read the complete chapters of the Quran without the distraction of multiple pages, legacy.quran.com is the perfect website for you. This straightforward platform presents the entire Quran on one page, allowing you to seamlessly navigate through different chapters and verses. With its simple design, legacy.quran.com offers a focused reading experience that helps you better comprehend the flow and interconnectedness of the Quranic chapters. Whether you are conducting research or simply reading the Quran, this website offers convenience and clarity.

5. Tarteel.ai

Tarteel.ai is an advanced platform that leverages artificial intelligence to enhance Quranic learning. This app utilizes AI-powered technology to detect mistakes in your recitation, track your progress, and provide feedback. With its speech recognition capabilities, Tarteel.ai helps Muslims improve their Quranic recitation by identifying areas for improvement and offering guidance. This innovative platform serves as a valuable tool for those looking to strengthen their connection with the Quran and enhance their recitation skills.

For Download this app is available for android and Ios also click here to visit.

https://vimeo.com/696935723

6. Sunnah.com

Sunnah.com is a treasure trove of information for every Muslim seeking to learn and understand the Hadith of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him). This website provides access to a vast collection of hadiths, making it an indispensable resource for understanding the teachings and practices of the Prophet. The user-friendly interface allows you to easily search for hadiths based on various criteria, such as book, chapter, or narrator. Sunnah.com enables you to explore the words and actions of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) at your fingertips.

Conclusion

The internet has revolutionized the way we seek knowledge, and when it comes to deepening your Islamic knowledge, these websites are invaluable resources. Websites like Quran.com, Quranicaudio.com, Salah.com, Sunnah.com, legacy.quran.com, and Tarteel.ai offer a wide range of tools and information that can help you strengthen your understanding of Islam. Whether you are looking to read the Quran, listen to recitations, learn about prayer timings, delve into the Hadith, or improve your recitation skills, these platforms have got you covered. Embrace the opportunities presented by these websites and take your Islamic knowledge to new heights. May your journey be filled with enlightenment and spiritual growth.

]]>

item.title: Unleash Your Creative Genius: 5 Mind-Blowing AI Tools for Graphic Designers to Supercharge Productivity
item.description: Enhance productivity using 5 AI design tools: 1) Cleanup Pictures, 2) Flair AI, 3) Illustroke, 4) PatternedAI, 5) Ocoya for content marketing
item.dc:creator: Abdulbasit Memon
item.content:encoded:
Here are some amazing AI tools that I come across in my exploration.

1. CLEANUP PICTURES

If you want to save time and get maximum results in minimum time to Enhance and upscale your image to remove unwanted objects from your pictures, then this tool is for you.Cleanup.pictures are also useful to remove any unwanted text, logo, date stamp, or watermark. Some of the key features of cleanup pictures include:

  • Drag & drop an image above to get started.

  • Retouch images in seconds with incredible quality.

  • You can import and edit pictures of any size but Export will be limited to 720px for the free version.

Cleanup Picture is an advanced editing tool based on Artificial Intelligence that is much better than other clone stamp tools. Clone tools like adobe photoshop fix, need a background reference, while our AI is truly able to guess what was behind the unwanted text, the unwanted people, and unnecessary objects in just a few clicks. You can remove unwanted text from a picture in a few seconds with impressive accuracy, As for objects or people, simply load your image in the tool and draw over the text or watermark that you'd like to remove. After a few seconds, you'll see it completely gone.

Visit site

2. FLAIR AI

Flair AI is an AI design tool that can help users create visually stunning, high-quality branded content quickly and easily, using artificial intelligence that offers an efficient and innovative way to generate great product photos for your advertisements or other content. As a designer, have a long way to do branding now using this tool will help designers to boost their work in a short time to create whole high-quality branding for a company. Now you can create top-notch quality product designs for your brands. With Flair AI, effortlessly craft captivating visuals that will undoubtedly seize your target audience's attention. Some of the key features of Flair Ai include:

  • Drag and drop your branded assets into our flexible Canvas.

  • Scene Construction: Use accessories to build a world around your product.

  • Smart prompt recommendations: to guide users in crafting the perfect scene description for their product.

  • Product Photography with Flair: works with the following CPG products: cans, bottles, mugs, packages, and more!

  • Get Inspiration and Learn from User-Generated Gallery a huge library of 200+ user-created product visuals Examples.

How Flair Works

https://player.vimeo.com/video/788380384?h=c535d60a37

  • Drag your product photos into the Canvas.

  • Visually describe the scene surrounding your product.

  • Edit, export, and share!

Flair AI is an AI design tool that enables users to create branded content with a simple drag-and-drop interface. Users can upload their own branded assets onto a flexible canvas and build a scene around their product with the help of accessories. Flair AI will then fill in the blank spaces, generating compelling images and scenes surrounding the products. Flair AI uses artificial intelligence to analyze and remove the background from product photos automatically. Users can then choose a style for the generated photos and resize and rotate the product photographs as needed. Flair AI also features smart prompt recommendations and an autocomplete feature to help users communicate with the AI. Tutorials are also available to help users learn how to make the most of the tool.

Visit site

3. ILLUSTROKE

Are you looking for eye-catching vector illustrations to elevate your design and captivate your audience? Do you Look for a fast and effortless way to create captivating vector illustrations using just a text prompt? then we Discover Illustroke.com, for you the ultimate AI-powered web application for generating stunning SVG images from text prompts effortlessly.

Now you can create Stunning vector illustrations from text prompts to Create website illustrations, logos and icons in seconds thanks to our advanced generative AI design tool. If you are a graphic designer, web developer, or just someone who didn't know anything about design but can create and, sell custom digital downloads on Vector Stock sites, you are sure to love this AI tool! to create an intensive amount.

Using Illustroke you will be able to create and customize vector illustrations. here are some key points to know how can create beautiful vector illustrations.

  • Type what you want to illustrate.

    You can create a wide variety of illustrations, ranging from corporate logos to video game characters the options are limitless.

  • Select your style.

    Select from over 40 distinctive styles, ranging from flat to isometric designs, each offering a unique and cohesive aesthetic.

  • You got limited cool illustrations!

    Vector illustrations (SVG) are scalable and customizable, while pixelated versions (PNG) are also available for download.

  • Customize as you want and download.

    You can effortlessly edit vector images using our editor, save them to the cloud, and access your work anytime you desire.

That's all there is to it! Quite remarkable, don't you think? Observe the results from the previous example. This is merely one of the many styles that the AI web app can generate. The possibilities with Illustroke are endless!

In summary, Illustroke.com makes creating eye-catching vector illustrations simpler and more cost-effective than ever. Whether you're a content creator, web designer, or someone looking to enhance their projects visually, Illustroke.com is the perfect solution!

Visit site

4.PatternedAI

Are you want to generate Unique seamless patterns of any surface in seconds free of cost using text then try patterned.ai to create seamless repeatable, unique patterns in seconds without any visible seams, and can even turn text into unique, royalty-free patterns. you can create unique and visually appealing designs content using Patterned.ai and also have the option to download into svg

PatternedAi allows you to Generate unique patterns for your product using AI. Search & create thousands of royalty-free patterns for every surface with our simple AI tool. Here are some features of Patterned.ai include:

  • Generate Seamless Unique patterns of any surface without visible seams as Guaranteed.

  • Describe what you want to create your pattern turns into royalty-free unique Patterns.

  • Generate Variations of your favorite pattern with high adjustable.

  • Customize and Handle several colors and resolutions to download in high-Quality Svg patterns.

  • prompt Guide: to help users in crafting the perfect prompt description to scale up the level and get maximum output.

  • Get Inspiration and Learn from User-Generated Gallery a huge library of user-created Patterns Samples that can help you with ideas and search for what you want to see or similar ones.

Visit site

5. Ocoya

What Ocoya do you are shocked about when you know about Ocoya features and working? Ocoya serves as an all-in-one content marketing solution, enabling you to elevate your content marketing efforts. Content marketing is an essential part of any business's marketing strategy. It involves creating, publishing, and distributing relevant content online to reach the target audience. However, managing a content marketing campaign can be challenging, especially if you're a small business or an individual.

Whether you are an individual, a small business, or a large corporation, numerous tools are available to assist in your content marketing campaign. However, finding one with all the necessary features to effectively manage your campaign can be challenging. Ocoya addresses this issue by offering comprehensive control over content creation, posting, and analytics within a single platform. Consequently, you no longer need to depend on separate tools for content creation and posting/analytics, streamlining your content marketing strategy.

Ocoya's biggest advantage over other content marketing tools is the ability to do bothcreate content, and at the same time, schedule it and view its analytics. Here are some of the features of Ocoya:

Create Eye-popping content in minutes

  • Create eye-catching graphics using drag-and-drop with millions of templates, stock photos & videos, licensed music, animation objects, backgrounds and text styles.

  • On your given simple command, it will generate multiple captions to choose from. it will produce various Announcements for your Ecommerce store product. You will also generate various relevant and trending hashtags too!

Schedule content to all social platforms

  • Utilize the world's most dependable scheduler to schedule up to 1,000 posts per minute on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

  • Post or schedule directly to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and LinkedIn See all your past and future posts in one place with a calendar. also, collaborate with teammates or clients on all one dashboard.

Use AI assistant for copywriting

  • you can Create perfect copy and produce text for all your promotional requirements in 28 languages. Just give a brief description and the copywriter will handle the rest!

  • The AI Assistant effortlessly generates and repurposes content, boosting engagement and growth across social media platforms with just a click, Whether it's Ad Copy, Captions, Blogs, Emails, or Website Content.

  • Select the task that is best for you, You can also try describing the tone or target market for an Ad. In the end, you can generate unlimited copy in 28 languages to find the right result for you.

Automate Social Media with AI

  • Streamline redundant processes and conserve time using Ocoya's AI-driven social media automation. Enhance your social media presence with RSS posting, action links, and numerous other features.

  • Transform your social media game with automated RSS posting. Our cutting-edge technology generates optimized posts from your RSS feeds with AI, including your captions, images and hashtags. Maximize social media impact without sacrificing time or resources.

Make your E-commerce Social

  • Easy Integrate your store with Ocoya in seconds and see all your product images and details in one place. generate captions and hashtags surrounding your products, and publish or schedule your final post to all your social media channels.

  • Connect your shop and produce professional graphics in seconds.

    Integrated with Shopify, Etsy and with Woo, Seamlessly.

Lovely Jubb.ly Link Shortener

  • If you need to include a lengthy Amazon link in your caption, utilize Jubb.ly, our built-in link shortener, to conserve space when sharing links on social platforms.

  • Stop wasting valuable space in your posts and start using Jubb.ly Unlimited for free today. Yes, it's free! and also Want to shorten multiple links at once? That's easy to do with Jubb.ly and has the option to generate unique QR Codes for each link.

Ocoya Easy Integrations

  • Easily integrate social media accounts, e-commerce shops or schedulers within Ocoya, so you can create ads, and posts and schedule them simultaneously Over 30+ integrations.

  • Ocoya has a great combination of integrated social, e-commerce and graphic design that maks content creation and SMM to the next level where you spent hours now here those work done in minutes.

Ocoya is a comprehensive social media API, where you can easily Create and publish posts and Integrate post creation and publishing functionality into your applications or websites. Ocoya's API streamlines your processes, making it easier to create and share content with their audiences.

With Ocoya you can not only Automate your Social media content but also generate content up to 50 different types of copies in 26+ languages for you, and run ad campaigns based on your budget. It helps you schedule posts across social profiles and track performance using analytics. Ocoya helps you with content creation like images, GIFs, videos, music, ads, product descriptions, and blog outlines.

Visit site

Thanks for reading

Follow me on Instagram & Facebook to stay connected!

]]>
